query:
SELECT 
  r.id,
  r.amount,
  r.paymentMethod,
  r.status,
  DATE_FORMAT(r.createdAt, '%d/%m/%Y') as data,
  DATE_FORMAT(r.createdAt, '%H:%i') as horario,
  r.createdAt as created_timestamp,
  c.email,
  c.pin
FROM recharges r
JOIN customers c ON r.customerId = c.id
WHERE c.email = 'xkelrix@gmail.com'
ORDER BY r.createdAt DESC
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 35dchGD4KrPJFby.root --database 2KeMNLvGvAyUJv9AEWkrsw --execute SELECT 
  r.id,
  r.amount,
  r.paymentMethod,
  r.status,
  DATE_FORMAT(r.createdAt, '%d/%m/%Y') as data,
  DATE_FORMAT(r.createdAt, '%H:%i') as horario,
  r.createdAt as created_timestamp,
  c.email,
  c.pin
FROM recharges r
JOIN customers c ON r.customerId = c.id
WHERE c.email = 'xkelrix@gmail.com'
ORDER BY r.createdAt DESC
